name: Jamaica
description: 93-02 Sutphin Blvd., Jamaica, NY 11435.  Corner of Sutphin Boulevard and Archer Avenue, 2 blocks south of Jamaica Avenue..The easiest way to Kennedy Airport is by Air Train.   AirTrain JFK leaves from the terminal adjacent to the Long Island Rail Road's Jamaica Station every 2 to 12 minutes, depending upon the time of day.
